filter_ppls(query, ppls=None, params=False)[source]ïƒ

Filters pipelines based on a query string applied to their configurations.

Parameters:

  • query (str) â€“ A query string used to filter pipeline configurations.

  • ppls (list or None, optional) â€“ List of pipeline IDs to filter. If None, all pipelines are considered.

  • params (bool, optional) â€“ Whether to return parameters of matching pipelines along with their IDs.

Returns:

Filtered list of pipeline IDs or tuples of (pplid, params) if params is True.

Return type:

list

group_by_common_columns(records)[source]ïƒ

Group pipeline records by their common set of DataFrame columns.

Parameters:

  • (dict) (records) â€“ (e.g., training histories with various metrics).

  • records (Dict[str, DataFrame])

Returns:

dict â€“ pipeline IDs sharing that column structure.

Return type:

A dictionary mapping each unique set of column names (as a frozenset) to a list of

Example

>>> records = {
...     "exp1": pd.DataFrame(columns=["epoch", "train_loss", "val_loss"]),
...     "exp2": pd.DataFrame(columns=["epoch", "train_loss", "val_loss"]),
...     "exp3": pd.DataFrame(columns=["epoch", "accuracy", "val_accuracy"])
... }
>>> group_by_common_columns(records)
{
    frozenset({'epoch', 'train_loss', 'val_loss'}): ['exp1', 'exp2'],
    frozenset({'epoch', 'accuracy', 'val_accuracy'}): ['exp3']
}
transfer_ppl(ppls, transfer_type='export', mode='copy', env=True)[source]ïƒ

Transfers pipeline data between main storage and transfer folder.

Parameters:

  • (list[str]) (ppls)

  • (str (mode) â€“ â€˜exportâ€™ moves data from main storage to transfer folder, â€˜importâ€™ moves data from transfer folder back to main storage.

  • optional) (Transfer mode, either 'copy' (default) or 'move'.) â€“ â€˜exportâ€™ moves data from main storage to transfer folder, â€˜importâ€™ moves data from transfer folder back to main storage.

  • (str â€“ â€˜copyâ€™ duplicates files, â€˜moveâ€™ relocates files.

  • optional) â€“ â€˜copyâ€™ duplicates files, â€˜moveâ€™ relocates files.

  • ppls (List[str])

  • transfer_type (str)

  • mode (str)

Raises:

ValueError â€“ If transfer_type or mode is invalid,: or if any pipeline ID is not found in the source records.

Return type:

None
